name: Falling Leaves - UAT Fall 2021 Jam Game
name_original: Falling Leaves - UAT Fall 2021 Jam Game
description:
As a tree, you find those pesky humans running beneath your limbs to be quite annoying.  Click to release one of your fall leaves. Make them all fall down.

Be sure to plan ahead and lead your targets, as leaves take time to fall.

Controls: Mouse + Left Click
